content.value:
It hurts to see multiple role models in the tech industry get pushed out or leave companies sooner than they wanted to for stupid reasons. 

Don’t even get me started on how we all know how difficult it is to find women in senior (or higher) engineering/leadership roles.
content.html: It hurts to see multiple role models in the tech industry get pushed out or leave companies sooner than they wanted to for stupid reasons. Don’t even get me started on how we all know how difficult it is to find women in senior (or higher) engineering/leadership roles.
